word_mean: 早熟的：在某年龄时发育较通常为早的

sentence.Network_en: From childhood, he was evidently at once rebellious and precocious.
sentence.Network_cn: 从儿时起，他就明显地既叛逆又早熟。

sentence.Network_en: Sue is a thoroughly precocious little madam if ever there was one.
sentence.Network_cn: 休确实是个少见的早熟的小丫头。

sentence.Network_en: a precocious child who started her acting career at the age of 5
sentence.Network_cn: 5岁便开始演艺生涯的超常儿童

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin praecox, praecoc- (from praecoquere 'ripen fully', from prae 'before' + coquere 'to cook') + -ious

entry.def: A precocious child is very clever, mature, or good at something, often in a way that you usually only expect to find in an adult.

example.ex: Margaret was always a precocious child...
example.tran: 玛格丽特一直是个早熟的孩子。

example.ex: She burst on to the world tennis scene as a precocious 14-year old...
example.tran: 她14岁时就作为一名网球神童闯入了世界网坛。

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by or characteristic of exceptionally early development or maturity (especially in mental aptitude);

sentences.sentence: "precocious flowers appear before the leaves as in some species of magnolias"

auth_sentence.content: Get a precocious-sounding title to put on your resume.

stems_affixes.word_buile: pre在……前的,预先+built建造的,build的过去式和过去分词→adj.预制的
pre在……前的,预先+car=care关心+ious……的→要预先关心的→冒险的
pre在……前的,预先+cise切→预先切好的→精确的
pre在……前的,预先+coc=coct煮+ious……的→提前煮熟→早熟的
pre在……前的,预先+school学校→上学前的
pre在……前的,预先+sci知道+ent表形容词→预先知道
pre在……前的,预先+amble跑→跑在前面→前言
pre在……前的,预先+caution小心→预先小心→预防
pre在……前的,预先+ced走+ent人或物等→走在前面的东西→先例
pre在……前的,预先+cept拿→以前拿好的[名言]→格言
pre在……前的,预先+cinct捆→预先捆好的→范围
pre在……前的,预先+cipice头→在前面是尽头→峭壁
pre在……前的,预先+cipit头→ation→落在前头→降落,下降
pre在……前的,预先+destination目的地→预先定好的目的地→命中注定
pre在……前的,预先+disposition性情→性情预定→癖性
pre在……前的,预先+fix固定→固定在前面→前缀
pre在……前的,预先+history历史→n.史前
pre在……前的,预先+occup占有+ation表名词→优先占有[注意力]→全神贯注
pre在……前的,预先+position位置→位置放在前面→前置词
pre在……前的,预先+rog要求+ative表名词→预先要求→[有]特权
pre在……前的,预先+ced走+e→走在前面→[时间上]先于
pre在……前的,预先+clud关闭+e→提前关闭→阻止
pre在……前的,预先+dict说→预先说→预言
pre在……前的,预先+fer带来→先带来→更喜欢
pre在……前的,预先+pay付钱→v.预付
pre预先,提前+coc=coct煮,调配+ious……的→提前煮熟→早熟的
pre预先,提前+coc=coct煮,调配+ity表名词→提前煮熟→早熟的
con全部+coct煮,调配→全部是调配出来的→捏造

means.word_mean: 早熟的,较早具备某种能力的,超常的

sentences.en: What a precocious child—reading Jane Austen at the age of ten!
sentences.cn: 10岁就读简·奧斯汀的作品，真是早慧！
